label: 無縁
本: Alms and Vagabonds: Buddhist Temples and Popular Patronage in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: The term has a wide range of connotations: it can indicate one who eschews social and political connections to seek out Buddhist enlightenment, one who has no official position and therefore has marginal status in society, or one who has died without descendants to maintain his or her ancestral tablets.
